; smooth transition to ortho road / diag owr transition 5F045C00
0x5f045c00,3,0,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5f045c00,3,0,0x00004d00,3,1
0x5f045c00,3,0,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5f045c00,3,0,0x00004d00,3,1
0x5f045c00,1,1,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5f045c00,1,1,0x00004d00,1,0
0x5f045c00,1,1,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5f045c00,1,1,0x00004d00,1,0

; Smoother Diagonal T-Intersections
;DxO
;Road Diag x Road Orth
0x00000a00,0,0,0x00003900,3,0=0x00003c00,3,0,0x00003a00,3,0
0x00000a00,3,0,0x00003900,1,1=0x00003c00,1,1,0x00003a00,1,1
0x00003900,1,0,0x00000a00,2,0=0x00003a00,1,0,0x00003c00,1,0
0x00003900,3,1,0x00000a00,1,0=0x00003a00,3,1,0x00003c00,3,1
;Stability
0x00000a00,0,0,0x00003a00,3,0=0x00003c00,3,0,0x00003a00,3,0
0x00000a00,3,0,0x00003a00,1,1=0x00003c00,1,1,0x00003a00,1,1
0x00003a00,1,0,0x00000a00,2,0=0x00003a00,1,0,0x00003c00,1,0
0x00003a00,3,1,0x00000a00,1,0=0x00003a00,3,1,0x00003c00,3,1
0x00003c00,3,0,0x00003900,3,0=0x00003c00,3,0,0x00003a00,3,0
0x00003c00,1,1,0x00003900,1,1=0x00003c00,1,1,0x00003a00,1,1
0x00003900,1,0,0x00003c00,1,0=0x00003a00,1,0,0x00003c00,1,0
0x00003900,3,1,0x00003c00,3,1=0x00003a00,3,1,0x00003c00,3,1

;Road Diag x One-Way Road Orth
0x09703a00,1,0,0x00000a00,2,0=0x09703a00,1,0,0x09703c00,1,0
0x09703a00,3,1,0x00000a00,1,0=0x09703a00,3,1,0x09703c00,3,1
;half-drag +-int prevent
0x09703a00,1,0,0x09703a00,3,0=0,0,0,0,0,0
0x09703a00,3,1,0x09703a00,1,1=0,0,0,0,0,0

;One-Way Road Diag x Road Orth
